item.title: Statistics and probability: your first steps on the road to data science
item.description:
Description

An introduction to statistics and probability geared toward enabling attendees to understand the capabilities and limitations of statistics and probability and to help them implement calculations in their projects. Where possible/feasible, attendees will build their own tools to help them grasp the underlying concepts. In addition, attendees will be introduced to the pre-built tools in world-class Python and data science libraries to help them capitalize on the efficiencies and utility that those libraries offer.
item.dc:creator: Chalmer Lowe

item.title: Pandas and Date Time
item.description:
Description

Welcome to the dark art of coding: Introduction to Pandas and Date Time.
item.dc:creator: Chalmer Lowe

item.title: bokeh: Data Visualization in Python
item.description:
Description

Bokeh is a powerful data visualization library that creates fully interactive plots and integrates well with the data analysis tools you already know and love: pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, ggplot. Bokeh can produce stand-alone browser-based plots and much more sophisticated server-hosted visualizations.

  • Learn to use bokeh to create everything from basic graphs to advanced interactive plots, dashboards, and data applications
  • Incorporate bokeh within your Jupyter/IPython notebooks
  • Partner bokeh with other libraries such as matplotlib, seaborn, pandas, and ggplot
  • Learn about bokeh server: to serve up even more impressive realtime visualizations
  • Explore configurations and settings
  • Recognize and overcome common problems
item.dc:creator: Chalmer Lowe
